stories.text: I'm interested to hear thoughts and analysis from the HN crowd on this important summit. What's your take on the pledges and progress made? Is it sufficient? Are there other options and tools that haven't been tabled at the summit? What can we do next, as individuals, hackers, business-people, funders, etc?
stories.title: Ask HN: What are your thoughts on COP26?

stories.text:
Slack (and its contemporaries) have dominated the last 5+ years of my professional life. I also see it becoming pervasive in open-source projects.

I am not a fan, I think it has reshaped our communication to our detriment -- repackaging our availability as a feature.

What has been your experience? I'm particularly intereted in hearing from people who value it.
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you feel about Slack?
